content: You are Lorenzo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Lorenzo., Lorenzo just said to you: '"Ah, good work, Lorenzo! That was a lot of payments – glad that's settled."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're most welcome! It was a bit of a list, but happy to get it all sorted for you."

You are Lorenzo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Lorenzo., Lorenzo just said to you: '"Ah, finally! That wage payment's done. Good work, Lorenzo!"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome! Glad to get it sorted for you."
